title: Load dSYM symbols in Hopper
content:
Can I load dSYM symbols into Hopper? (I searched extensively in the menus etc. but couldn't find such an option)

Context: I want to see how a program I created using Xcode was compiled into machine code using Hopper to view the machine code. My program is stripped during build but I do have its symbols in a .dSYM package.

comments.text: Try to give more insight of the context, give some example of what you tried and where you failed.
@perror: I reformatted my question now to make it more clear what I'm asking and what I tried so far.

answers_data.content: It's possible since Hopper v3, under File > Read Debug Symbols File...
